    static boolean
    searchAssociatedParts(Part selectedPart)
    Searches to find if a given part is also an associated part to any other product Returns false if a part is the only associated part to a given product otherwise returns true This is so the delete function knows if it should go through with deleting the part or not
    static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part>
    searchPartResult(int search, javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> partObservableList)
    Searches a given list for a Part ID and returns all matches
    static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part>
    searchPartResult(String search)
    Searches the All Parts list for a Part ID or Part Name and returns all matches Will show error message if no parts are found and return all parts instead
    static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product>
    searchProductResult(String search)
    Searches all Products list for a Product ID or Product Name and returns all matches

    • searchPartResult

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> searchPartResult(String search)
      Searches the All Parts list for a Part ID or Part Name and returns all matches Will show error message if no parts are found and return all parts instead

    • searchProductResult

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> searchProductResult(String search)
      Searches all Products list for a Product ID or Product Name and returns all matches

    • searchAssociatedParts

      public static boolean searchAssociatedParts(Part selectedPart)
      Searches to find if a given part is also an associated part to any other product Returns false if a part is the only associated part to a given product otherwise returns true This is so the delete function knows if it should go through with deleting the part or not
